column1: Diplomacy, International Business and Trade MSc
column3: Institute for Diplomacy and International Governance
column5: Our Diplomacy, International Business and Trade MSc provides an extensive overview of the practices of international business diplomacy. The challenges of trading in the global village, and the multiple communities and markets driving world commerce through new and old trade routes are dissected in this programme.You will learn in an environment tailor-made for the development of the skills needed to critically understand globalisation, as well as the knowledge of the current issues characterising relations between diplomacy, international business, and international trade.
column7: For more information, please visit the programme page on our website.
column9: Full-time: 1 year, Part-time: up to 4 years
